entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening with risk of freezing rain. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:39 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:39 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:39 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022
